title: A Brief History Of Israel, Palestine - Understanding A Decades-Old Conflict
content: Israel and Hamas have been waging war since gunmen from the Palestinian militant group in the Gaza Strip stormed into southern Israel on Oct. 7, killing 1,200 people and capturing 253 hostages, by Israeli tallies.
summary: Israel and Hamas have been waging war since gunmen from the Palestinian militant group in the Gaza Strip stormed into southern Israel on Oct. 7, killing 1,200 people and capturing 253 hostages, by Israeli tallies.

title: "Captain, Aged 22...": Israel Says 1st Soldier Killed In Lebanon Combat Ops
content: The Israeli military said one of its soldiers was killed in combat operations in Lebanon on Wednesday, marking the first loss since its forces crossed the border to target Hezbollah.
summary: The Israeli military said one of its soldiers was killed in combat operations in Lebanon on Wednesday, marking the first loss since its forces crossed the border to target Hezbollah.

title: 1869 MIT Exam Paper Goes Viral For Being Too Easy, Can You Crack It?

title: As Israel-Iran Conflict Escalates, India Inc Braces For Trade Disruption

title: Rescuers Save 4 Stranded Killer Whales In Russia's Kamchatka: Report
content: A group of Russian rescuers and volunteers have saved four killer whales stranded for hours off the Kamchatka Peninsula in Russia's far east after leading them to deeper waters, the SHOT Telegram channel reported on Wednesday.
summary: A group of Russian rescuers and volunteers have saved four killer whales stranded for hours off the Kamchatka Peninsula in Russia's far east after leading them to deeper waters, the SHOT Telegram channel reported on Wednesday.

title: Matthew Perry Death Case: Accused Doctor Expected To Plead Guilty
content: One of two California doctors who were among the five people charged in the overdose death of "Friends" star Matthew Perry is expected to plead guilty on Wednesday to a charge of illegally distributing the drug ketamine.
summary: One of two California doctors who were among the five people charged in the overdose death of "Friends" star Matthew Perry is expected to plead guilty on Wednesday to a charge of illegally distributing the drug ketamine.

title: "Stain On UN":  Israel Bars Entry Of Secretary General Antonio Guterres
content: Israel has declared UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres as persona non grata and barred him from entering the country following his failure to "unequivocally condemn" Iran's massive missile attack on Israel.
summary: Israel has declared UN Secretary General Antonio Guterres as persona non grata and barred him from entering the country following his failure to "unequivocally condemn" Iran's massive missile attack on Israel.

title: US Man Tries To Kill Terminally Ill Wife To "Ease Her Suffering"

title: Queen Elizabeth Had A Form Of Bone Cancer, Claims Boris Johnson In Memoir
content: Late Queen Elizabeth II had a form of bone cancer in her final years, former British Prime Minister Boris Johnson claimed in his memoir.

title: 47 Tigers Die In Vietnam Zoos Due To H5N1 Bird Flu Virus: Report
content: Forty-seven tigers, three lions and a panther have died in zoos in south Vietnam due to the H5N1 bird flu virus, state media said Wednesday.
summary: Forty-seven tigers, three lions and a panther have died in zoos in south Vietnam due to the H5N1 bird flu virus, state media said Wednesday.

title: Diagnostic Errors Can Occur In 1 Out Of Every 14 Patients, New Study Shows
content: Diagnostic errors are likely to be occurring in as many as 1 in every 14 (7 per cent) hospital patients which requires new approaches to medical surveillance, a new study has stressed.

title: Inside Israeli Ground Raids Against Lebanon's "Conquer The Galilee" Plan
content: Hezbollah is planning to replicate its own "October 7-style" attack on Israel to capture the northern Galilee region, the Israeli Defence Forces have claimed as they began ground incursions into the Hezbollah stronghold on Monday.

title: What Countries Are Doing To Rescue Nationals Out Of Lebanon Amid Conflict

title: Video Shows Iran Launching Hundreds Of Ballistic Missiles At Israel

title: Escalating Tensions In West Asia: India Calls For Restraint By All Sides

title: Over 100 People To Sue US Rapper Sean 'Diddy' Combs In Sex Assault Case
content: More than 100 people, including dozens of children, who say they were victims of rape, sexual assault and sexual exploitation at the hands of Sean "Diddy" Combs are to sue the US rap star, a lawyer said Tuesday.
